_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Etherpad
author: kontakt@kodingwww.ml
description:
Etherpad is a highly customizable open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
Author: kry008

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

cd /mnt/server
git clone --branch master https://github.com/ether/etherpad-lite.git
cd etherpad-lite
ls
rm settings.json
echo "{" | tee settings.json
echo "    \"title\": \"Etherpad\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"favicon\": null," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"skinName\": \"colibris\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"skinVariants\": \"super-light-toolbar super-light-editor light-background\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"ip\": \"0.0.0.0\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"port\": ${SERVER_PORT}," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"showSettingsInAdminPage\": true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"dbType\": \"dirty\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"dbSettings\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"filename\": \"var/dirty.db\"" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"defaultPadText\" : \"Welcome to Etherpad!\n\nThis pad text is synchronized as you type, so that everyone viewing this page sees the same text. This allows you to collaborate seamlessly on documents!\n\nYou are using this on PterodactylIO server, egg made by: kry008\n\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"padOptions\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"noColors\":         false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"showControls\":     true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"showChat\":         true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"showLineNumbers\":  true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"useMonospaceFont\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"userName\":         false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"userColor\":        false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"rtl\":              false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"alwaysShowChat\":   false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"chatAndUsers\":     false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"lang\":             \"en-gb\"" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"padShortcutEnabled\" : {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"altF9\":     true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"altC\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdShift2\": true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"delete\":    true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"return\":    true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"esc\":       true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdS\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"tab\":       true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdZ\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdY\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdI\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdB\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdU\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmd5\":      true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdShiftL\": true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdShiftN\": true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdShift1\": true, " | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdShiftC\": true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"cmdH\":      true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"ctrlHome\":  true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"pageUp\":    true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"pageDown\":  true" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"suppressErrorsInPadText\": true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"requireSession\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"editOnly\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"minify\": true," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"maxAge\": 21600," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"abiword\": null," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"soffice\": null," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"tidyHtml\": null," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"allowUnknownFileEnds\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"requireAuthentication\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"requireAuthorization\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"trustProxy\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"cookie\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"sameSite\": \"Lax\"" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"disableIPlogging\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"automaticReconnectionTimeout\": 0," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"scrollWhenFocusLineIsOutOfViewport\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"percentage\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "        \"editionAboveViewport\": 0," | tee -a settings.json
echo "        \"editionBelowViewport\": 0" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"duration\": 0," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"scrollWhenCaretIsInTheLastLineOfViewport\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"percentageToScrollWhenUserPressesArrowUp\": 0" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"users\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"${LOGIN_ETH}\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "        \"password\": \"${PASS_ETH}\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "        \"is_admin\": true" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      }" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"socketTransportProtocols\" : [\"xhr-polling\", \"jsonp-polling\", \"htmlfile\"]," | tee -a settings.json
echo "  " | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"socketIo\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"maxHttpBufferSize\": 10000" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"loadTest\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"dumpOnUncleanExit\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"importExportRateLimiting\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"windowMs\": 90000," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"max\": 10" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"importMaxFileSize\": 26214400," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"commitRateLimiting\": {" | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"duration\": 1," | tee -a settings.json
echo "      \"points\": 10" | tee -a settings.json
echo "    }," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"exposeVersion\": false," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"loglevel\": \"INFO\"," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"customLocaleStrings\": {}," | tee -a settings.json
echo "    \"enableAdminUITests\": false" | tee -a settings.json
echo "  }" | tee -a settings.json
echo "  " | tee -a settings.json
npm i
echo -e "install complete"


exit 0

variables.name: Admin login
variables.description:
Login for: http://IP:PORT/admin page
You can only change it before first run!

variables.name: Admin password
variables.description:
Password for: http://IP:PORT/admin page
You can only change it before first run!
